name: Charge Shot
description:
Charge Shot is a first person shooter in which you must defeat waves of enemies with only one chargeable bullet. This project was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 and is my second ever game jam. Hope you enjoy!

Controls:

WASD - move

left mouse - shoot  (hold down for longer distance)

right mouse - recall bullet

How To Play:

Enemies spawn on the red cubes around the arena. Your objective is to  defeat all the enemies in each wave and try and beat your high score. However your points decrease over time and running out of points is a game over, so you have to be quick to build up your multiplier and gain enough points to counter the loss. You also have to watch out for risk  which increases when you have the bullet and decreases when you don't. If your risk maxes out  or gets to 0 you lose health so keep that in mind as well.
